text:
Hey CA! Let’s stop arguing about what to do in section 2 of the #CArecall ballot. 🌞

Section one is your vote. *For Newsom.* 🗳

Can’t stand leaving section 2 blank? Pick a Dem, any Dem. 🤷🏼‍♀️

But mail your ballot back. Today. 📫

We win in section 1 or we lose to the GOP. Period. https://t.co/LDs11n3SWl
